languages.text: "Молчи, дура! Даже не можешь нормально сделать то, что тебе велели!" {n}Скоморох кидает на Мейв полный презрения взгляд.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Молчи, дура! Даже не можешь нормально сделать то, что тебе велели!" {n}Охнув, девушка испуганно замирает.{/n}
traits.speaker: FW_TrueGovernor_Buffoon

languages.text: "Shut up, you idiot! You can't even do as you're told!" {n}The fool tosses a look of utter contempt at Maive.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Молчи, дура! Даже не можешь нормально сделать то, что тебе велели!" {n}Скоморох кидает на Мейв полный презрения взгляд.{/n}

"Shut up, you idiot! You can't even do as you're told!" {n}The fool tosses a look of utter contempt at Maive.{/n}

languages.text: “给我闭嘴，你这个白痴！这么简单的事情都做不明白！”{n}小丑朝梅芙投去了充满蔑视的目光。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Shut up, you idiot! You can't even do as you're told!" {n}The fool tosses a look of utter contempt at Maive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “给我闭嘴，你这个白痴！这么简单的事情都做不明白！”{n}小丑朝梅芙投去了充满蔑视的目光。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Calla, idiota! ¡No sabes ni hacer lo que se te dice!». {n}El bufón lanza una mirada de desprecio absoluto a Maive.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Shut up, you idiot! You can't even do as you're told!" {n}The fool tosses a look of utter contempt at Maive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Calla, idiota! ¡No sabes ni hacer lo que se te dice!». {n}El bufón lanza una mirada de desprecio absoluto a Maive.{/n}

languages.text: "Kapa çeneni aptal! Sana söyleneni bile yapamıyorsun!" {n}Soytarı, Maive'e küçümseyici bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Shut up, you idiot! You can't even do as you're told!" {n}The fool tosses a look of utter contempt at Maive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kapa çeneni aptal! Sana söyleneni bile yapamıyorsun!" {n}Soytarı, Maive'e küçümseyici bir bakış atıyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「黙れ、馬鹿野郎！お前は俺の言ったとおりにもできなかった！」{n}彼はメイヴに軽蔑した目を向ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Shut up, you idiot! You can't even do as you're told!" {n}The fool tosses a look of utter contempt at Maive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「黙れ、馬鹿野郎！お前は俺の言ったとおりにもできなかった！」{n}メイヴは恐怖であえぎ、固まる。{/n}

languages.text: « Silence, petite idiote ! Tu n'es même pas capable de faire ce qu'on te dit ! » {n}Le bouffon lance un regard de dégoût à Maive.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Shut up, you idiot! You can't even do as you're told!" {n}The fool tosses a look of utter contempt at Maive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Silence, petite idiote ! Tu n'es même pas capable de faire ce qu'on te dit ! » {n}Le bouffon lance un regard de dégoût à Maive.{/n}

languages.text: "Schweigt, Dummkopf! Ihr könnt nicht einmal tun, was man Euch sagt!" {n}Der Hofnarr wirft Maive einen Blick völliger Verachtung zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Shut up, you idiot! You can't even do as you're told!" {n}The fool tosses a look of utter contempt at Maive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Schweigt, Dummkopf! Ihr könnt nicht einmal tun, was man Euch sagt!" {n}Der Hofnarr wirft Maive einen Blick völliger Verachtung zu.{/n}
